trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> base class representing a comparison that can be used to constrain an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: Clase base <see langword="abstract" /> que representa una comparación que se puede utilizar para restringir una ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> o una ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is the abstract base class from which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> is derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> es la clase base abstracta de la que se deriva <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is evaluated by comparing the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> se evalúa comparando el valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> con <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> mediante la aplicación de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se implementa en una clase derivada, inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the member whose value will be compared.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, obtiene o establece el nombre del miembro cuyo valor se comparará.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del miembro que se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> will be compared to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> se comparará con <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the operator to use in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, obtiene o establece el operador que se utilizará en la comparación.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the value to compare.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, obtiene o establece el valor que se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> will be compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> se comparará con el valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
